teststorydesc: The EHR vendor loads Hib immunization history data for Juan Marcel Gonzales.
preCondition: The EMR has recorded all of the pediatric demographic in the record created for Juan Marcel Gonzales.
postCondition: The immunization history for Hib known to the local practice is loaded into the record created for Juan Marcel Gonzales.
testObjectives: Record Past Immunizations: The EHR or other clinical software system allows providers to enter information about immunizations given elsewhere (e.g., by another doctor, at a public health clinic, pharmacy, etc.) with incomplete details.
evaluationCriteria:
Evaluation Criteria: Vendor successfully records all immunization data known to the local practice as provided, with all required attributes:

Hib Dose 1 of 4
